</div>
    <article class="markdown-body entry-content container-lg f5" itemprop="text"><h1 align="center" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-hi--im-Tharulan" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#hi--im-Tharulan"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Hi <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nixin72/nixin72/master/wave.gif"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nixin72/nixin72/master/wave.gif" alt="Waving hand animated gif" height="45" width="45" data-animated-image="" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>, I'm Abi..</h1>
